capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? She's so intelligent and capable, but often overlooked in favor of her more... flashy colleagues. Anyway, it's good to see that we can confirm some facts about our beloved wizarding world!

I've heard that Flitwick is a female character in the Harry Potter series. I think it's interesting how J.K. Rowling chose to make her one of the few female professors at Hogwarts, and it's great that we have more representation of women in leadership roles now.
